filmography.title: A Damsel in Distress
filmography.role_description: A British noblewoman who falls for an American dancer, despite her family's objections.
filmography.plot: An American dancer in London falls in love with a noblewoman, but her family wants her to marry someone of her own class.

filmography.title: Gunga Din
filmography.role_description: The fiancée of a British sergeant in India who finds herself competing with the army for his attention.
filmography.plot: Three British soldiers and a native water bearer must stop a secret revival of the murderous Thuggee cult in India.

filmography.title: The Women
filmography.role_description: The naive and innocent friend in a circle of cynical socialites, whose own marriage is threatened by gossip.
filmography.plot: A wealthy woman discovers her husband is having an affair with a shopgirl, leading to a divorce and a battle of wits among her social circle.

filmography.title: Rebecca
filmography.role_description: A shy, young paid companion who marries a wealthy widower and is tormented by the memory of his first wife and a sinister housekeeper.
filmography.plot: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: Suspicion
filmography.role_description: A sheltered heiress who marries a charming playboy but becomes increasingly convinced he plans to murder her for her money.
filmography.plot: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; NYFCC: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: This Above All
filmography.role_description: An aristocrat who joins the Women's Auxiliary Air Force and falls in love with a disillusioned deserter during the Blitz.
filmography.plot: During the Blitz, a young woman joins the WAAF and falls in love with a disillusioned deserter who is hiding from his duty.

filmography.title: The Constant Nymph
filmography.role_description: A sickly teenage girl who harbors a deep, unrequited love for a family friend and composer, leading to a tragic end.
filmography.plot: A young girl falls in love with a composer who marries her cousin, but he eventually realizes his true muse was the girl all along.

filmography.title: Jane Eyre
filmography.role_description: The resilient orphan who becomes a governess at Thornfield Hall and falls in love with its brooding master, Mr. Rochester.
filmography.plot: After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house.

filmography.title: Frenchman's Creek
filmography.role_description: A bored aristocratic wife in 17th-century Cornwall who finds adventure and romance with a French pirate.
filmography.plot: An English noblewoman leaves her husband and children to find adventure with a French pirate.

filmography.title: The Affairs of Susan
filmography.role_description: A famous actress whose personality changes to match the desires of the four different men who love her.
filmography.plot: Four men recount their romances with the same woman, each describing a completely different personality.

filmography.title: From This Day Forward
filmography.role_description: A woman who reflects on her struggles to build a life with her husband amidst poverty and war.
filmography.plot: A young couple struggles with unemployment and the draft during the years surrounding World War II.

filmography.title: Ivy
filmography.role_description: An Edwardian socialite who resorts to poisoning to remove the obstacles standing between her and a wealthier lover.
filmography.plot: An ambitious woman poisons her husband to be with a wealthier man, but finds herself entangled in the investigation.

filmography.title: Letter from an Unknown Woman
filmography.role_description: A woman who harbors a lifelong, unrequited obsession with a famous pianist, leading to a tragic destiny.
filmography.plot: A pianist receives a letter from a woman he has forgotten, revealing their past affair and the son she raised in secret.

filmography.title: The Emperor Waltz
filmography.role_description: An Austrian countess who clashes and then falls in love with an American phonograph salesman in 1901 Vienna.
filmography.plot: An American salesman tries to sell a phonograph to Emperor Franz Joseph of Austria and falls in love with a countess.

filmography.title: You Gotta Stay Happy
filmography.role_description: A wealthy heiress who flees her wedding night and hitches a ride on a cargo plane with a struggling pilot.
filmography.plot: A rich woman runs away from her groom on her wedding night and ends up involved with a pilot and a embezzler.

filmography.title: Kiss the Blood Off My Hands
filmography.role_description: A compassionate clinic worker who falls for a violent former POW on the run from the police.
filmography.plot: A psychologically disturbed war veteran kills a man and goes on the run, finding shelter with a lonely nurse.

filmography.title: September Affair
filmography.role_description: A concert pianist who, along with a married engineer, allows the world to believe she died in a plane crash to start a new life.
filmography.plot: Two lovers meet in Italy and decide to start a new life together after they are mistakenly listed as dead in a plane crash.

filmography.title: Born to Be Bad
filmography.role_description: A manipulative and ruthless woman who uses her innocent appearance to destroy the lives of those around her for social gain.
filmography.plot: A scheming woman manipulates her way into high society and destroys the engagement of her cousin.

filmography.title: Ivanhoe
filmography.role_description: The beautiful Saxon ward of Cedric and the love interest of the knight Ivanhoe in this medieval epic.
filmography.plot: A knight returns from the Crusades and seeks to restore the throne to King Richard while caught in a romantic triangle.

filmography.title: Something to Live For
filmography.role_description: An aspiring actress battling alcoholism who falls in love with the AA member trying to help her.
filmography.plot: A recovering alcoholic tries to help a young actress with a drinking problem, but their relationship threatens his marriage.

filmography.title: The Bigamist
filmography.role_description: The business-focused wife of a man who secretly maintains a second family in another city.
filmography.plot: A businessman marries a woman he meets on a trip, but keeps his first marriage a secret.

filmography.title: Casanova's Big Night
filmography.role_description: A woman who hopes the legendary lover Casanova will help her family, only to get a lowly tailor impersonating him.
filmography.plot: A tailor impersonates Casanova to test the fidelity of a woman, but gets caught up in political intrigue.

filmography.title: Serenade
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who seduces and then abandons a rising opera singer, nearly destroying his career.
filmography.plot: A poor farm worker rises to become an opera star but is manipulated by a wealthy woman.

filmography.title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
filmography.role_description: The fiancée of a writer who frames himself for murder to prove the flaws in the justice system.
filmography.plot: A writer frames himself for a murder to prove the insufficiency of circumstantial evidence, but the plan goes wrong.

filmography.title: Island in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A woman from an elite white family in the Caribbean who has a romance with a Black politician, causing scandal.
filmography.plot: Race relations and romance cause tension in the British West Indies during the 1950s.

filmography.title: Until They Sail
filmography.role_description: The eldest of four sisters in WWII New Zealand who falls in love with a weary American Marine officer.
filmography.plot: Four sisters in New Zealand struggle with life and love during World War II when American soldiers arrive.

filmography.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
filmography.role_description: A scientist aboard a nuclear submarine who becomes involved in a mission to save the Earth from a burning radiation belt.
filmography.plot: The crew of a nuclear submarine must race to save the world when the Van Allen radiation belt catches fire.

filmography.title: Tender Is the Night
filmography.role_description: The sister of a wealthy, mentally unstable woman who tries to control her sister's marriage to a psychiatrist.
filmography.plot: A psychiatrist marries his wealthy patient, but their life on the French Riviera destroys his career and their marriage.

filmography.title: The Witches
filmography.role_description: A schoolteacher who returns from Africa after a breakdown and discovers witchcraft in a small English village; her final film role.
filmography.plot: A schoolteacher becomes involved in the occult when she moves to a small English village.
